product_overview: FoodVision is a digital marketing platform tailored exclusively for the food sector, offering high-conversion landing pages for photography and consulting services along with client and admin dashboards for managing digital assets.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive marketing solution for restaurants and food businesses to access professional visual marketing services.
Automate the sales and delivery process of digital assets through a centralized platform.
Ensure data security and user privacy with proper authentication and storage mechanisms.
Offer responsive and performant frontend experience with engaging animations.
Enable administrators to manage clients and their digital assets efficiently.
key_features: Landing Page with Hero section, pricing plans, social proof, and problem/solution presentations to attract and convert customers.
User authentication via Supabase Auth including login, registration, protected routes, and password recovery.
Integration with Cakto payment gateway for seamless plan checkout and subscription management.
Client Dashboard displaying subscription status and providing access to downloadable deliverables.
Admin Dashboard with access control, client and file management functionalities.
Secure cloud storage using Supabase Storage with Row Level Security to protect user files.
Performance optimizations including image compression, lazy loading, and smooth animations using Framer Motion.
Responsive UI built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and enhanced by Lucide React icons.
user_flow_summary: User visits the landing page and views service offerings and pricing plans.
User selects a plan and, if unauthenticated, prompted with a login or registration modal.
Upon successful authentication, user is redirected to Cakto checkout with email pre-filled.
Post payment, user gets access to their dashboard where they can view subscription status and download files.
Administrator logs into Admin Dashboard, searches for clients, uploads contracted files, and manages user access.
Clients receive notifications of new files and can download them securely from their dashboard.
validation_criteria: Landing Page loads quickly with optimized images and responsive design.
Authentication workflow correctly restricts access to protected routes and supports login, registration, and password recovery.
Payment integration captures and processes purchases accurately with user email synchronization.
Client Dashboard accurately reflects plan status and provides file access with download functionality.
Admin Dashboard restricts access to administrators and supports client search and file management (upload/delete).
File storage enforces Row Level Security to prevent unauthorized access.
Animations and UI feedback are present for user interactions with no blocking or errors.
System complies with security best practices to protect user data and sessions.
